description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Experience the fluid and intensely satisfying action of radiangames JoyJoy, the happy twin-stick shooter.  This is the first game in the radiangames series.  radiangames JoyJoy was the #1 US-ranked game in the 2010 Dream.Build.Play competition.
